catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 500
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: comic books depicting changes after foreigners entered Japan; mostly text; scenes of Japanese people staring at, and harassing Western man in street; Japanese men smoking and drinking in Japanese style room with a Western hat on floor; Japanese men admiring Western man in street; blue cover with impressed floral pattern
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
title: Collection of Humorous Leftovers (Kokkei zansai bukuro 滑稽残菜嚢), vol.
